attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This mature healthy oak tree is being needlessly threatened by developer A J Bloor, who is refusing to adhere to the claims of his own website, "We make every effort to conserve the natural environment of each location 
including the wildlife and the preservation of natural features".
In the case of this tree he is refusing to consider amending his plans to save this valuable tree, despite a petition of over 500 signatures and extensive local media coverage.
Please make him change his mind, so that the present and future residents of this part of Gloucestershire (both human and wildlife)can continue to enjoy this tree.
